商品名稱: SHEWIN 女款休閒波西米亞風印花 V 領長袖寬鬆襯衫上衣
SKU: 尺寸: X-Large顏色: 2 種新花卉黃
留言內容: This yellow floral top is great!!! There is a slip part inside the top that is soft and feels cool on my skin. I love the florals and colors!! It fits me well, I bought an XL. I am 5'10" 190lbs for reference. This top looks great longer or tucked in. I bought it for my upcoming girls wine tasting trip. Decently priced, shipping was quick. I like to wear this top as shown in my 1st picture. Its a flowy top and I pinned it back at the waist above the tailbone area with a safety pin because I wanted it to look more fitted to my body.So there are really 3 ways to wear this top,pinned back/fitted,tucked into pants/bottoms,or loose and flowy. Try it all 3 ways till you find your comfortable. I will keep this top, and I plan to buy more colors soon. This is a beautiful, soft floral feminine top. =).

商品名稱: SHEWIN 女款休閒波西米亞風印花 V 領長袖寬鬆襯衫上衣
留言內容: It fits beautifully just as expected.

商品名稱: SHEWIN 女款休閒波西米亞風印花 V 領長袖寬鬆襯衫上衣
SKU: 尺寸: Large顏色: 1 個花卉綠
留言內容: I had to size up to a Lg.  I am 5'5" and 150lbs. Ordered a Med but it was too tight in the bust line.  The Lg fits better.  It is boxy looking if just left to hang.  But tucked in at the front with a cute belt makes the outfit super cute.  The top is more muted colors.  The top is lined so it is not too sheer.  It is lightweight and airy.  Good for springtime.

商品名稱: SHEWIN 女款休閒波西米亞風印花 V 領長袖寬鬆襯衫上衣
留言內容: The arms are funny fit by the shoulder. Tight on upper arm . Do not like at all. Not to me too. Just received and it’s been months since I placed the order.

商品名稱: SHEWIN 女款休閒波西米亞風印花 V 領長袖寬鬆襯衫上衣
SKU: 尺寸: Medium顏色: 1 件花卉紅色
留言內容: It fits great and is very comfortable. The “red” is really very pretty shades of pink. It’s very flattering and is lined. It doesn’t cling to my body, which is great. I have not wash it yet so I can’t comment on that.

商品名稱: SHEWIN 女款休閒波西米亞風印花 V 領長袖寬鬆襯衫上衣
留言內容: I'm disappointed. I love the fabric and style but the collar is sewn so poorly that I just can't overlook how wonky it is. Sending it back as soon as I get the label printedSide note, the sleeves are rocking a serious Hollie Hobbie vibe, with seams at both the elbow and above the wrist.

商品名稱: SHEWIN 女款休閒波西米亞風印花 V 領長袖寬鬆襯衫上衣
SKU: 尺寸: Small顏色: 1 種花卉多色。
留言內容: The bodice is comfortably lined and material feels like a crepe-type, it is not sheer, nor is it stretchy. I have a rectangle figure, 5’1”, 130lbs and ordered a small. Plenty of room; almost too baggy, with wider shoulders and 34, C cup.  Some flowers are a brighter rose color, but to me, the print of the shopping picture looked more mauve.

商品名稱: SHEWIN 女款休閒波西米亞風印花 V 領長袖寬鬆襯衫上衣
SKU: 尺寸: Large顏色: 3 花卉灰色
留言內容: This blouse is exactly what I was looking for. It’s beautiful, very lightweight, and very comfortable for those hot / warm summers. I actually bought a larger size last year, but wanted one that was a little bit more form fitting and this is perfect. Although, the website has many selections, I wish you guys would add more designs. I love the way it’s made from a wonderful quality material that also has an inner lining because the blouse is very thin. I plan to order a few more designs, but please continue to add more short sleeve designs with the same materials?!?!

商品名稱: SHEWIN 女款休閒波西米亞風印花 V 領長袖寬鬆襯衫上衣
SKU: 尺寸: X-Large顏色: 1 件花朵白色
留言內容: It’s a very nice blouse.  I ordered my normal size but it’s just too loose and long for the look I was going for, so I sized down and it was more fitted and looked better tucked in. The loose flowy sleeves make this blouse look dressier than one with normal sleeves .I love it.

商品名稱: SHEWIN 女款休閒波西米亞風印花 V 領長袖寬鬆襯衫上衣
SKU: 尺寸: Medium顏色: 1 種花卉多色。
留言內容: I love how it looks on.  My only frustration is that I forgot how I do not love 100% polyester.  I still think I will wear it.  But, it will most likely be when it's reaily cold.  It does not breathe at all, and the fabric is not soft.  But, if you wear a good lotion, that takes care of the texture.  I tried to wear it today to work, but I felt hot in it before I could go to work.  So, yes, I love how it looks, and I will wear it.  But, I'm bummed that it's 100% polyester.  I bet on a cold winter day, I will love that it dies not breathe.  So, that's why I took off a star.  The sleeves are pretty.  The cut is great.  With jewelry it's very pretty on.  But, 100% Polyester.  Not great in the deep south this time of year.
